title: Login with valid test credentials
description: Verify that a user can log in successfully using the hardcoded test credentials

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid email 'example@gmail.com' and password '123456789'
Click the login button
User is logged in and redirected to a protected main page

title: Login with invalid credentials
description: Verify that login fails with incorrect email or password and shows an error message

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter invalid email or password
Click the login button
User remains on the login page and receives an appropriate error message

title: Access protected route without login
description: Verify that user cannot access protected routes such as Search or BookingHistory without logging in

steps.description: Navigate directly to a protected route in the app, e.g., /search or /booking-history
User is redirected to the login page

title: Search hotels by location filter
description: Verify that searching hotels by location returns correct filtered hotel cards

steps.description: Log in with valid credentials
Navigate to the Search page
Input a valid hotel location filter
Submit the search
Search results display hotel cards matching the input location

title: Search flights by route filter
description: Verify that searching flights by route filter returns correct filtered flight cards

steps.description: Log in with valid credentials
Navigate to the Search page
Input a valid flight route filter
Submit the search
Search results display flight cards matching the input route

title: Search with empty filters shows all results
description: Verify that submitting search without filters returns all available hotels or flights

steps.description: Log in with valid credentials
Navigate to the Search page
Leave location and route filters empty
Submit the search
Search results display all hotels and flights available in local data

title: Simulate booking a hotel
description: Verify user can select a hotel from search results and proceed to the simulated booking placeholder page

steps.description: Log in with valid credentials and search for hotels
Select a hotel card from search results
Navigate to the booking placeholder page for the selected hotel
Booking page shows placeholder content indicating simulation

title: Simulate booking a flight
description: Verify user can select a flight from search results and proceed to the simulated booking placeholder page

steps.description: Log in with valid credentials and search for flights
Select a flight card from search results
Navigate to the booking placeholder page for the selected flight
Booking page shows placeholder content indicating simulation

title: Booking recorded in history after simulation
description: Verify that after simulating a booking, the booking is recorded and visible in the user's booking history

steps.description: Log in and simulate booking a hotel or flight
Navigate to Booking History page
Booking history lists the recently simulated booking with accurate details

title: Submit a review for a booked hotel
description: Verify user can submit a rating and comment as a review for a hotel they have booked

steps.description: Log in and identify a previously booked hotel in booking history
Navigate to the Reviews page for that hotel
Submit a review with rating and comment
Review is accepted and displayed in the list of reviews for that hotel

title: Submit a review for a booked flight
description: Verify user can submit a rating and comment as a review for a flight they have booked

steps.description: Log in and identify a previously booked flight in booking history
Navigate to the Reviews page for that flight
Submit a review with rating and comment
Review is accepted and displayed in the list of reviews for that flight

title: View review list for a hotel or flight
description: Verify that users can view all submitted reviews with ratings and comments for a hotel or flight

steps.description: Log in and navigate to the Reviews page of a selected hotel or flight
All previously submitted reviews with rating and comment are displayed correctly

title: View booking history list
description: Verify that the user can view a list of all their past bookings including detailed hotel and flight data

steps.description: Log in and navigate to the Booking History page
All past hotel and flight bookings are listed with relevant details

title: Admin adds a new hotel entry
description: Verify that an administrator can add a new hotel entry in the admin panel and it appears in searches

steps.description: Log in as admin user
Navigate to the Admin panel
Fill in details for a new hotel and submit to add
New hotel appears in the dataset and is searchable by users

title: Admin deletes a hotel entry
description: Verify that an administrator can delete an existing hotel entry and it no longer appears in searches

steps.description: Log in as admin user
Navigate to the Admin panel
Select an existing hotel entry and delete it
Deleted hotel is removed from the dataset and no longer appears in search results

title: Admin adds a new flight entry
description: Verify that an administrator can add a new flight entry and the flight becomes searchable

steps.description: Log in as admin user
Navigate to the Admin panel
Fill in details for a new flight and submit
New flight is added and visible in flight search results

title: Admin deletes a flight entry
description: Verify that an administrator can delete an existing flight entry and it no longer appears in searches

steps.description: Log in as admin user
Navigate to the Admin panel
Select an existing flight entry and delete it
Deleted flight no longer appears in the flight search results

title: UI navigation using React Router
description: Verify that navigation between login, search, booking, reviews, booking history, and admin pages operates correctly with protected routes

steps.description: Log in with valid credentials
Navigate sequentially between Search, BookingHistory, Reviews, and Admin pages
All pages load correctly and protected routes restrict access when not logged in

title: Application runs locally without errors
description: Verify that the entire application runs locally with minimal setup without throwing runtime errors

steps.description: Start the application locally
Application loads, login works, and main features (search, booking simulation, reviews, booking history, admin) operate without errors

title: Review submission validation
description: Verify that review submission validates for required fields such as rating and prevents empty submissions

steps.description: Navigate to a review submission form for a hotel or flight
Attempt to submit a review with missing rating or comment
Review submission is blocked and appropriate validation messages are displayed
